DOC.brief_summary: Annually , estimate 2.6 million still births occur half die labor delivery ( fresh stillbirth ) . In addition , around 750,000 newborn die shortly birth due intrapartum-related hypoxia birth asphyxia . Almost 99 % perinatal death take place low-income country provider/patient ratio low fetal monitoring inadequate . Poor intrapartum fetal heart rate monitoring , failure identify fetal distress , subsequently intervene , common pathway perinatal death low-resourced setting . Recently , innovative fetal heart rate monitoring device , call Moyo , use ultrasound technology , develop strap mother labour . This project compare effectiveness automatic use Moyo versus intermittent use hand-held Doppler detection abnormal fetal heart rate , randomize control study , University hospital , Dar e Salaam , Tanzania .
DOC.brief_title: Moyo ; strap-on Fetal Heart Rate Monitoring Urban Setting
